com.icesoft.faces.component.commandsortheader.CommandSortHeader.isArrow()
          It no longer has any effect in 1.7. To alter the appearance of the arrow images, the following style classes need to be customized: iceCmdSrtHdrAsc, iceCmdSrtHdrDesc 
com.icesoft.faces.component.commandsortheader.CommandSortHeader.setArrow(boolean)
          It no longer has any effect in 1.7. To alter the appearance of the arrow images, the following style classes need to be customized: iceCmdSrtHdrAsc, iceCmdSrtHdrDesc
